news_results.title: ACME Technologies raises £25M Series B to expand AI platform
news_results.snippet: London-based ACME Technologies has raised £25 million in Series B funding led by Sequoia Capital to expand its enterprise AI platform...

news_results.title: Green Energy Solutions secures major renewable energy contract
news_results.snippet: Manchester-based Green Energy Solutions has secured a £50 million contract to develop smart grid infrastructure across Northern England...
